text: Rizal, officially the Province of Rizal (), is a province in the Philippines. It is in the Calabarzon region of Luzon. Its capital is the city of Antipolo. ==Major highways== * Marikinaâ€“Infanta Road ==Adjacent provinces== * Bulacan (north) * Metro Manila (west) * Laguna (south) * Quezon (east) ==Communities== ===Cities=== * Antipolo (capital city) ===Municipalities=== * Angono * Baras * Binangonan * Cainta * Cardona * Jalajala * Morong * Pililla * Rodriguez * San Mateo * Tanay * Taytay * Teresa
title: Rizal
